meanings.definition: A large wild ox found in Southeast Asia.
meanings.sent1: The seladangs grazed peacefully in the lush meadow.
meanings.sent2: I saw a herd of seladangs while hiking in the jungle.
meanings.sent3: The seladangs decided to have a dance party in the forest.
meanings.sent4: The seladangs were like majestic giants roaming the land.
meanings.sent5: The image of the seladangs stayed etched in my mind.

meanings.definition: The plural form of the word 'seladang'.
meanings.sent1: There were many seladangs in the zoo.
meanings.sent2: The seladangs were a sight to behold.
meanings.sent3: The seladangs organized a picnic for all the animals.
meanings.sent4: The seladangs stood out among the other creatures.
meanings.sent5: The seladangs' presence filled the enclosure with energy.
